name: Kill the Habits
description:
Small game I did for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.

The theme of the Jam was "Less is More".

My idea behind the game is that having lesser bad habits adds more value to our life. You're trying to beat your binging habit (let's say form a certain streaming service called N Flix, no better Net F) and for that you need to gain willpower before your life ends and you realize that it was wasted.

Braking a bad habit can be really tough, so I liked the idea of each bad habit being a Boss Fight. Of course I wanted to do more bosses but time is up.

I really enjoyed the experience, I have a lot of ideas on how improve the game and I'll probably will.

You can check out the code in Github: https://github.com/bugtective/killthehabits

Thanks for playing!
